parameters.name: PDataIn
parameters.description: Pointer to a raw bitmap (HBITMAP) cast as a long

title: IModelDoc2.InsertSketchPictureData
description: Inserts a picture into the current sketch.
signature:
void InsertSketchPictureData( 
   System.Int16
Width
,
   System.Int16
Height
,
   System.Int32
PDataIn
)

parameters.name: PDataIn
parameters.description: Pointer to a raw bitmap (HBITMAP) cast as a long

remarks:
If your application must be x64 compatible, then use
IModelDoc2::InsertSketchPictureDatax64
.
A copy of the specified bitmap data is created. The SOLIDWORKS Design software does not release your bitmap object.
